comparison.Description: Number against which to compare equation solution

comparison_duration.Description: Duration of the comparison value presentation

comparison_onset.Description: Onset of the comparison value presentation

comparison_representation.Description: Whether the comparison value is presented in "word" or "numeric" form.

equation_representation.Description: Whether the equation is presented in "word" or "numeric" form.

feedback_type.Description: Whether trial feedback will be informative or not.

Levels.informative: Feedback will indicate whether or not response was correct.
Levels.uninformative: Feedback will not indicate whether or not response was correct.

first_term.Description: The first term in the equation.

Levels.add: The first term is added to the second term.
Levels.divide: The first term is divided by the second term
Levels.multiply: The first term is multiplied by the second term
Levels.subtract: The second term is subtracted from the first term.

rounded_difference.Description: Difference between the solution and the comparison value, rounded to the nearest integer.

second_term.Description: The second term in the equation.

stim_file_first_term.Description: File for the first term in the equation.

stim_file_operator.Description: File for the operator in the equation.

stim_file_second_term.Description: File for the second term in the equation.
